script.name: Enable Special Flags for Fighter Hitboxes
script.description: Enables special flags such as rehit, blockability & more from Item hitboxes
script.code:
gecko 2147978912
lbz r0, 0x00000042(r23)
rlwinm. r0, r0, 27, 31, 31
beq OriginalExit_80078ea0
lfs f1, 0x0000002C(r28)
lfs f0, 0x0000002C(r24)
fcmpu cr0, f1, f0
beq CanHit_80078ea0
b OriginalExit_80078ea0
CanHit_80078ea0:
ba r12, 2147979816
OriginalExit_80078ea0:
lbz r0, 0x00000134(r23)
gecko.end

script.name: Enable Special Flags for Fighter Hitboxes: Subaction Event
script.code:
cmpwi r28, 61
bne+ OriginalExit_sff
lwz r3, 0x00000008(r29)
lbz r4, 0x00000001(r3)
rlwinm r4, r4, 27, 29, 31
lbz r7, 0x00000001(r3)
rlwinm r7, r7, 30, 29, 31
sub r7, r7, r4
addi r7, r7, 1
cmpwi r7, 0
bgt GetHitStruct_sff
li r7, 1
GetHitStruct_sff:
mulli r4, r4, 312
addi r4, r4, 2324
add r4, r30, r4
mtctr r7
ReadLoop_sff:
lhz r5, 0x00000040(r4)
lbz r6, 0x00000002(r3)
rlwimi r5, r6, 4, 20, 27
sth r5, 0x00000040(r4)
lbz r5, 0x00000041(r4)
lbz r6, 0x00000003(r3)
rlwimi r5, r6, 28, 28, 28
stb r5, 0x00000041(r4)
lbz r5, 0x00000041(r4)
lbz r6, 0x00000003(r3)
rlwimi r5, r6, 28, 29, 29
stb r5, 0x00000041(r4)
lbz r5, 0x00000041(r4)
lbz r6, 0x00000003(r3)
rlwimi r5, r6, 28, 30, 30
stb r5, 0x00000041(r4)
lbz r5, 0x00000042(r4)
lbz r6, 0x00000003(r3)
rlwimi r5, r6, 4, 25, 25
stb r5, 0x00000042(r4)
lbz r5, 0x00000042(r4)
lbz r6, 0x00000003(r3)
rlwimi r5, r6, 4, 26, 26
stb r5, 0x00000042(r4)
addi r4, r4, 312
bdnz+ ReadLoop_sff
addi r3, r3, 4
stw r3, 0x00000008(r29)
ba r12, 2147955500
OriginalExit_sff:

script.name: Enable Special Flags for Fighter Hitboxes: FastForward
script.code:
cmpwi r28, 61
bne+ OriginalExit_sff_ff
lwz r4, 0x00000008(r29)
addi r4, r4, 4
stw r4, 0x00000008(r29)
ba r12, 2147955792
OriginalExit_sff_ff:

addi r4, r4, 4
stw r4, 0x00000008(r29)

OriginalExit_sff_ff2:
